Desc.entry: Forms part of the structure for cricket in the United Kingdom. Established by the England and Wales Cricket Board, the Yorkshire Cricket Board etc. Representatives from the many cricket clubs in Sheffield meet with the Yorkshire Cricket Boards South Yorkshire Cricket Development Manager and others to plan and co-ordinate activities to promote and develop cricket in the city. A particular focus is on offering access to the sport across all sections of the community including youth cricket, girls' cricket, cricket for people with disabilities and promoting strong links with schools.
